Special Notes:

RAR-files: rzx-ls13dlcpr.rxx, ZIP-files: rzx-ls13dlcprx.zip

Game version (cracked files): v2.0.0.9


Repack Notes:

This previous release, (Farming.Simulator.2013.Three.DLC.Packs-RZRX911) Titanium DLC
version info bad, this DLC version v1.0.0.1 not v1.0.0.3 and "Only" tags added into 
release name.
This REPACK release contained updated Titanium DLC, the version info correct.
Installer package updated and changed to splitted version. (Example: setup.exe, 
setup-1.bin, this previous version creatd big *.exe installer) Installer languages 
English only. (Hungarian localization removed.) Farming Simulator 2013 Update 
v1.4/2.0 serials included. This DLC-s don't need serials for activation. 
German and Polish version crack added.*
Latest update/game v1.4/2.0 not included! 

Crack list:*
German users: use "CrackGERx86" dir located crack file.
Polish users: use "CrackPOLx86" dir located crack file.

Other localized users:**
French/Spanish/Italian users: use ENG version crack file.
Czech users: use HUN version crack file.
Chinese users: use POL version crack file.

**not tested, probably working.

Steam and MacOSX version not tested.

All users use v1.4 patch and latest v2.0 patch or v2.0 game installed and activated 
before DLC Packs installation!


English:

This release contains unlocked and activated DLC packages. This x64 bit executables
not cracked, x86 version only!

DLc list:

* Ursus Addon DLC (v1.2)
Contains the following equipment: Ursus C-45, Ursus C-330, Ursus 5044, 
Ursus 8014H, Ursus 11024, Ursus 15014 and much more.

* Marshall Trailers Pack DLC (v1.0)
Contains the following equipment: Marshall BC 32, Marshall MS 105, Marshall QM 16, 
Marshall ST 1800 and Marshall VES 2500.

* Titanium Addon DLC (v1.0.0.3)
Contains the following equipment: Case IH Farmall H, Case IH Puma 160, 
Case IH Magnum 340, Case IH 7130, Case IH 9230, Krone Big X 1100 and much more.

The "Farming Classics" DLC not included, this Freeware, try it download to author 
site.


System Requirements:

Farming Simulator 2013 English version installed game and already updated to v2.0 
versions. This DLC-s required Update 2.0!


Install:

0. Uninstall previous DLC Packs installation (This if installed. This game not 
uninstall.)
1. Unzip/Unrar
2. Disable UAC (for Windows Vista/7/8 users only). Disable antivirus 
sript/sandbox-protection module or fully disabling and disconnect to internet
3. Open "Setup" folder and run "FarmingSimulator2013DLCPacks.exe" file use install 
the DLC Packs the installed game main directory (Run As Administrator mode!)
4. Open "CrackENGx86" dir and copy "FarmingSimulator2013Game.exe" file to
installed game "x86" dirs, and replacing and overwriting original file
5. Blocking game executables use favorize firewall apps
6. Play game (This game not activated, before activate use any serials, located in 
"serial.txt" file)
7. Supporting developers and buy it now

Uninstall:

1. Open Control Panel, select "Farming Simulator 2013 DLC Packs" items, and press 
uninstall button use for uninstalling Three DLC extensions
___________________________________________________________________________________


I tested it myself and it's working fine. Sorry for slow upload speeds, my connection can be jumpy sometimes. Just be patient, it'll get better.
Enjoy.
